articles.content: Barely days after signing a USD 3 billion financing in India's most widely syndicated loan, Reliance Industries Ltd and its unit Reliance Jio Infocomm have raised USD 2 billion add-on foreign currenc… [+4277 chars]

articles.title: Indian firm linked to eye drop deaths broke safety norms: US - DAWN.com
articles.description: Three deaths, eight cases of vision loss and four surgical eye removals have been reported after the use of products from India.
articles.content: NEW DELHI: The manufacturer of eye drops that have been linked to an outbreak of serious bacterial infections in the US, including at least three deaths, did not follow proper protocol to prevent con… [+2386 chars]

articles.title: 30-min test ride of Super Meteor 650 in mixed conditions: 6 key points - Team-BHP
